issue.title: UnionVector getBuffers method does not include typevector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-269](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-269). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Only the interMapVecgtor's buffers are returned currently.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-269?focusedCommentId=16172700) by Li Jin (icexelloss):*
`[~wesmckinn]` this is fixed by https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/ec51d566708f5d6ea0a94a6d53152dc8cc98d6aa
